name: @cldmv/envm
description: Cross-platform environment variable manager for Node.js (ESM, no classes)

scripts.build: npm run clean && esbuild src/*.mjs --minify --platform=node --format=esm --outdir=dist && esbuild src/platform/*.mjs --minify --platform=node --format=esm --outdir=dist/platform && npm run rename-dist-js-to-mjs
scripts.rename-dist-js-to-mjs: for %f in (dist\*.js) do ren %f %~nf.mjs && for %f in (dist\platform\*.js) do ren %f %~nf.mjs

author: Shinrai <git@cldmv.net> (http://cldmv.net)
